donation.description: Support our local church's youth programs and community outreach

zelle.instructions: Please include your order number in the Zelle memo field. Orders are confirmed upon payment receipt.

scoutLaw.text: A Scout is Trustworthy, Loyal, Helpful, Friendly, Courteous, Kind, Obedient, Cheerful, Thrifty, Brave, Clean, and Reverent

content.heroSubtitle: Beautiful wreaths, poinsettias, and holiday plants
content.aboutText: Cub Scout Pack 182 of Readington, NJ is raising funds through our annual holiday sale. We offer beautiful wreaths, festive poinsettias, and other holiday plants. Each purchase supports our scouts' activities and helps develop future leaders in our community.

faq.question: How do I pay for my order?
faq.answer: We accept payment via Zelle to threebridgespack182@gmail.com (Boy Scouts of America). You can also pay with cash or check for in-person orders entered by scouts.

faq.question: When will I receive my wreath?
faq.answer: All wreaths are made to order. Pickup is scheduled for December 15, 2025 (tentative). You'll receive an email with final pickup details and location confirmation.

faq.question: Can I support a specific scout?
faq.answer: Yes! If you received a link from a scout, your purchase will automatically be attributed to them. You can also ask any scout for their unique link or QR code.

faq.question: What if I just want to make a donation?
faq.answer: We appreciate donations! You can add a donation to First United Methodist Church during checkout. All donations are welcome and help support our local community.
